explains: n. 明胶；动物胶；胶制品
wordGroup: gelatin sponge 明胶海绵；海绵胶

sentences.en: "If I see any kind of flower, I can do it in gelatin," she says, "I took my orchid gelatin to friends' parties, and they were wowed."
sentences.cn: “如果我看见任何一种花，我就可以用胶冻做，”她说，“我把我的兰花胶冻带到了朋友的聚会上，他们都赞不绝口。”

sentences.en: The paint was covered by salt crystals and gelatin glue.
sentences.cn: 可是因为该幅作品被晶体盐和明胶覆盖。

sentences.en: What the gelatin industry does with the bones, we don't want to know.
sentences.cn: 我们不想知道明胶企业对这些骨头做了些什么。
